word:
Sanitarium (Napa County) California 
                                    November 18, 1909 

Dr. D. H. Kress Dear Brother: 


     Yesterday I received and read a letter from you, and I thank you for explaining your convictions and feelings so fully as you have done. I am glad that you and your wife can be united in your labors. With your varied gifts, you can unitedly do an excellent work. 
                                                                           164
